name: Grand Canyon
hint: Immense gorge carved by the Colorado River in Arizona

name: Great Plains
hint: Vast expanse of flat grassland across the central United States and Canada

name: Rocky Mountains
hint: Major mountain range stretching from Canada to New Mexico

name: Appalachian Mountains
hint: Ancient eastern mountain range stretching from Alabama to Newfoundland

name: Everglades
hint: Tropical wetland ecosystem in southern Florida, river of grass

name: Mojave Desert
hint: Arid desert in southeastern California, home to Joshua trees

name: Great Basin
hint: Largest area of contiguous endorheic watersheds in North America

name: Canadian Shield
hint: Large area of exposed Precambrian rock covering much of eastern Canada

name: Death Valley
hint: Hottest place on Earth, lowest point in North America, in California

name: Niagara Falls
hint: Famous waterfalls on the US-Canada border between Lakes Erie and Ontario
